rows.label: qst100905_msg0006
rows.name:
[ML:Feeling kind=Anger ]Frozen in ice? For five years...?! No...
It can't be!

rows.label: qst100905_msg0007
rows.name:
But... I remember a battle...
What happened to the enemies?

rows.label: qst100905_msg0008
rows.name:
After you got frozen, a bunch of
Garlus came storming in here
and beat them up.

rows.label: qst100905_msg0009
rows.name: Ah...I see...

rows.label: qst100905_msg0010
rows.name:
Well, sorry for reacting like that...
I think I got hold of the wrong end of
the stick...

rows.label: qst100905_msg0011
rows.name: I thought I was still fighting that battle...

rows.label: qst100905_msg0012
rows.name: Thanks, all of you.

rows.label: qst100905_msg0013
rows.name:
Thanks to you, my memories of
Therida are safe!

rows.label: qst100905_msg0014
rows.name:
Therida... You should rest in Luxuria for
a little while.

rows.label: qst100905_msg0015
rows.name:
Anyone'd need to get their bearings
after being asleep for five years.

rows.label: qst100905_msg0016
rows.name: Kingdom of Luxuria...

rows.label: qst100905_msg0017
rows.name:
Luxuria, eh... Hey, I wonder whatever
happened to its crazy Prince...
What was his name?

rows.label: qst100905_msg0018
rows.name:
He'd be 25 now... An eligible bachelor,
I dare say!

rows.label: qst100905_msg0019
rows.name: Therida...

rows.label: qst100905_msg0020
rows.name:
Did we wind up here because you
accepted a job just because you were
star-struck?

rows.label: qst100905_msg0021
rows.name:
Hmm... Maybe? Sorry, after five years
on ice, my memory's not so great...

rows.label: qst100905_msg0022
rows.name:
Thanks, everyone!
Well, see you around!

rows.label: qst100905_msg0023
rows.name:
But, man, five years is nothing really!
If I'd stayed frozen for five hundred,
imagine the crazy future I'd wake up to!

rows.label: qst100905_msg0024
rows.name:
I bet everyone'd be wearing super-cool
future clothes, and I'd become a star,
on account of my old-timey charm...

rows.label: qst100905_msg0025
rows.name:
*sigh* It's nice Therida's back to her
old self, at least. Still, we'd best go
back to town for now.

rows.label: qst100905_msg0026
rows.name: Good idea.
